MemoryInfobox.image: ACOD FoA JoA The Last Call.png
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Aletheia called out to Kassandra one final time to confront her trials of the Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff head on. The last phase for the Keeper was fast approaching.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'
MemoryInfobox.location: Gateway to the Lost City, Thera, Greece

General_Description: '''The Last Call''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with [[Aletheia]] at the [[Gateway to the Lost City]] to initiate the simulation of [[Atlantis]].
Section_Dialogue:
While in the Gateway to the Lost City, Kassandra came across Aletheia once again.
*'''Aletheia:''' ''Once more, Keeper. I ask you to return to me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's Aletheia - must be close to finishing my trials of the [[Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff]]. I'll find her.''
Kassandra approached Aletheia.
*'''Aletheia:''' ''We're nearing the end of your journey, Keeper. You and the Staff are nearly connected. Are you ready to proceed?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm ready. Let's go.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra spoke to Aletheia to finish up her last trial to master the Staff of Hermes Trismegistus.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''
